body.p:
To His Excellency Beriah MaGoffin
Governor of Kentucky

Your petitioner Albert Shannon would respectfully represent to your Excellency that on the day of July 1861 he was tryed before John R Graham Esq Police Judge of the city of Frankfort upon a warrant charging your petitioner with having committed a Breach of the peace in the said City on the night of the day of July 1861 by loud Your petitioner would represent that he was on said warrant fined The Sum of five dollars & costs. & would respectfully ask that your Excellency will exercise Executive Clemency towards him by remitting so much of said fine as is not due to the officers of said City
We the undersigned would respectfully unite with Albert Shannon his above Petition --

Will H. Sneed
Gray & Todd
W W Stephens
H I Todd
A Kahr
P Joyce

Frankfort Po. Ct
A Shannon
Petition to the governor
